2. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU Kastamonu Bulgaria Success Story Presented by : Mr. Naci GUNGOR Brand & Corporate Communications Manager of Kastamonu Entegre – Turkey ncgungor@keas.com.tr www.keas.com.tr

4. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU 2.8 billion USD turnover 14.000 employees 29 factories

5. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU HAYAT KİMYA FABRIC&HOME CARE TISSUE&TOWELHYGIENE CARE WASHING CLEANER DISHWASHING DETERGENT SURFACE CLEANER BABY DIAPER WET TOWEL HYGIENIC PED ADULT DIAPER PATIENT PROTECTIVE COVER TOILET TISSUE KITCHEN TOWEL NAPKIN HANDKERCHIEF FACIAL TISSUE WET TOWEL

6. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU

7. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU Laminate Flooring WE PRODUCE EVERY DAY Interior Door PanelsPanels for Furniture FOR 3.000HOUSES

8. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU KASTAMONU ENTEGRE IN FIGURES 1st The consolidated sales revenue (Billion USD) 1.2 Turnover realised abroad (Million USD) 512 2016 figures 1st in the Wood Based Panel Sector in Turkey 4th in the Wood Based Panel Sector in Europe 7th in the Wood Based Panel Sector in the World Export Countries 100

10. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU

11. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU Investing Abroad  When the company has reached a certain market share in Turkish market as of year 1998, in order to maintain sustainable growth, the first investment abroad was decided to be made with the target of becoming a regional leader.  Our vision is to become one of the top five manufacturers in the wood-based panel sector globally.  Our long term goals include continue investing in new locations close to the market and wood raw material resources in order to realise the globalisation of Kastamonu.

12. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU Investing Abroad  We have the principle of “contributing and consolidating the local employment” in all the countries where we have investments.  40 % of our turnover is made in foreign markets whereas 60 % in Turkey and our aim is to increase the percentage of foreign markets by investing more abroad.  In Romania, we are in the 2nd place with a 31% domestic market share, the leader in Bulgaria with a 36% domestic market share and also in Russia with a 25 % market share in the domestic MDF market.

13. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU KASTAMONU BULGARIA A.D. – PARTICLE BOARD PLANT 230.000 m² total area, 41.000 m² indoor area

14. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU Kastamonu Bulgaria

15. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU The success story of growth from a small woodworking business to the second biggest Turkish Investment in Bulgaria… • We invested in Bulgaria due to its advantages in wood raw material supply and proximity to Turkey. • In year 2000 we acquired the Gabrovnitsa factory in the Kazanlik region of Bulgaria and installed a particleboard facility with an investment of 30 million Euros. We are now building a second particle board line in this location which will increase our total investment in Bulgaria to 100 million Euro. When the second production line will start in 2020, our total production capacity will increase to 700.000 cubic meters/year • Particleboard production in Bulgaria is 50% for export and are shipped to more than 40 countries including Balkans and Europe.

16. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU KASTAMONU BULGARIA In 1948, near the village Gorno Sahrane, Gabrovnitsa AD started production as a small woodworking business. In year 2000 we acquired this company and changed the name to Kastamonu Bulgaria in 2012. BRIEF HISTORY OF INVESTMENT IN BULGARIA  Raw and Melamine Faced Particleboard needed for furniture production  Pellet  Urea Formaldehyde glue for particleboard production PRODUCT RANGE

17. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU KASTAMONU BULGARIA  Difficulty in finding qualified employees in smaller cities of Bulgaria. Also young people prefer to work abroad or in big cities.  Wood raw material is exported to neighboring countries. If it was processed in factories like ours, it would multiply its value by 3-4 times, and this added value would remain in Bulgaria MAJOR PROBLEMS

18. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU KASTAMONU BULGARIA Total Investment : 100 million Euro Over 400 workers Turnover in 2017 : 53 million USD Second Production Line to Start Up in 2020 From June 2013 "Kastamonu Bulgaria" has the international FSC-certification, which guarantees the legal origin of the wood raw materials we use.

19. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU ACHIEVEMENTS CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY AWARDS  Since 2000, we are one of the main sponsors of the "Rose Festival" in Kazanlak and Pavel Banya. Moreover, we are among of the biggest sponsors for the construction of the "Museum of Rose" in the city Kazanlak  Sponsor of Kazanlık St.Kril Methodiy High School Voleyball team which will represent Bulgaria in World championship in 2018. SPONSORSHIPS  Award given by Deputy - Minister of Agriculture and Forestry, Mr. Georgi Kostov "Corporate social responsible enterprise" of the Republic of Bulgaria  Award given by the mayor of Kazanlak Municipality - Ms. Galina Stoyanova "Enterprise which develops the largest charity in the region"(to support retirement homes for disadvantaged children to sports clubs, community centers, ensembles, etc.).

20. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU RAW AND MELAMINED FACED PARTICLE BOARD

21. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU ECO FRIENDLY PELLET

22. GLOBAL PLAYER OF THE WOOD BASED PANEL INDUSTRY AĞAÇ BAZLI PANEL SEKTÖRÜNÜN GLOBAL OYUNCUSU Bulgaria Strong points Weak points  Opportunities granted to the members of Customs Union producing within the European Union.  Stagnating effects of the ongoing economic crisis and high competition from imported goods having adverse affect on sales and profit margins.  The obligation to export more than half of production since the consumption is low in Bulgaria due to being a relatively small market.  Presence of large scale Furniture exporters in the country.  Expectation of an increased purchase power in Bulgaria, which is a member of European Union, for upcoming years.  Discounted import tax or import tax exemption granted especially by North African countries to the members of the European Union.  Capacity increase plans of the competitor by new investments in Bulgaria.  It is not possible to transfer the increase on the prices of raw materials to the sales prices. Opportunities Threats
